name: Tetrix 2
overview: A fake sequel to Tetrix, which was released to the scene in 1994 by Hawkeye Soft, who were notoriously lame for hacking other PD/shareware games that year (e.g. MEGABALL 3) and taking credit for work that wasn't their own. Rules are same as the original. It was released with the German Amigo Disk Magazine at one point.
